org.universAAL.ri.api.manager.server

Class Authenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.universAAL.ri.api.manager.server.Authenticator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.service.http.HttpContext

    public class Authenticator
extends Object
implements org.osgi.service.http.HttpContext
    Implementatino of OSGi HttpContext to be used by the Servlet. It is used only for Authentication purposes, and only if the hardcoded registration of servlet is enabled.
    Author:
    alfiva

      • getUserAndPass

        public String[] getUserAndPass(String auth)
        Parses the Authorization header for BASIC authentication
        Parameters:
        auth - The BASE64 encoded user:pass values. If null or empty, returns false
        Returns:
        A String array of two elements containing the user and pass as first and second element
